entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:55 p.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
